","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"option":{"optionsLHS":[{"text":"बेईमानी करनेवाला","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":1,"$$hashKey":"object:5212"},{"text":"टोली का नाम","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":2,"$$hashKey":"object:5213"},{"text":"इनाम के रुपये","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":3,"$$hashKey":"object:5214"},{"text":"टोली का मुखिया","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":4,"$$hashKey":"object:5244"},{"text":"ये गाँव के सपूत हैं","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","index":5,"$$hashKey":"object:5254"}],"optionsRHS":[{"text":"रामू।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":1},{"text":"बाल-शक्ति।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":2},{"text":"पाँच हजार।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":3},{"text":"मोहन।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":4},{"text":"बुजुर्ग।","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","mapIndex":5}],"questionCount":0},"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":5,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"जोडकर लिखिए। ","title":"जोडकर लिखिए। ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Hindi","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Hindi","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MTF"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
